name: part_003
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】The First Note【 #⁠音乃瀬奏生誕祭2025 】#hololiveDEV_IS #ReGLOSS [mt8AyISL9Ig]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: MC section where ReGLOSS members introduce themselves and celebrate Kanade's birthday.

subtitles.original: 踊る 重なってしまうよ
subtitles.english: Dancing, we overlap

subtitles.original: 不恰好なままでいいから
subtitles.english: It's okay to be clumsy

subtitles.original: その声は どこまでも鳴り響いて
subtitles.english: That voice will resonate forever

subtitles.original: 確かな理由を抱いて
subtitles.english: Holding a certain reason

subtitles.original: ここまで来たんだ ああ
subtitles.english: I've come this far, ah

subtitles.original: まだ終わらない 旅路なんだ
subtitles.english: The journey hasn't ended yet

subtitles.original: いつか 思いは形になる
subtitles.english: Someday, feelings will take shape

subtitles.original: この真っ白に染まる朝
subtitles.english: This morning dyed in pure white

subtitles.original: 忘れられないままの宝
subtitles.english: A treasure that remains unforgettable

subtitles.original: 諦めてしまうほど この先たくさんの
subtitles.english: So much that I might give up, ahead lie many...

subtitles.original: もうない 迷いはしないよ
subtitles.english: No more, I won't hesitate anymore

subtitles.original: かけがえのないもの 溢れてしまうよ
subtitles.english: Irreplaceable things are overflowing

subtitles.original: 答えは君のその手の中に
subtitles.english: The answer is in your hands

subtitles.original: 離さないで 物語は一歩前
subtitles.english: Don't let go, the story takes a step forward

subtitles.original: 諦めてしまうほど
subtitles.english: So much that I might give up

subtitles.original: この先たくさんの 後悔が君を待ってる
subtitles.english: Many regrets are waiting for you ahead

subtitles.original: けどもうない 迷いはしないよ
subtitles.english: But no more, I won't hesitate anymore

subtitles.original: この傷も愛おしく思えてしまうほど
subtitles.english: So much that even these wounds seem dear

subtitles.original: 重なってしまうよ
subtitles.english: We overlap

subtitles.original: 不恰好なままでいいから
subtitles.english: It's okay to be clumsy

subtitles.original: 走れ その歩幅で
subtitles.english: Run, at your own pace

subtitles.original: 走れ 声を届かせてくれ
subtitles.english: Run, let your voice be heard

subtitles.original: 期待と不安を同じくらい抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Embrace expectation and anxiety in equal measure

subtitles.original: 澄んだ今を紡ぐ未来 照らして
subtitles.english: Illuminate the future spun from this clear present

subtitles.original: ありがとー！ おめでとー！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: 改めておめでとー！ ありがとー！
subtitles.english: Congratulations again! Thank you!

subtitles.original: 待って、そういえば自己紹介してなくね？ あー、確かに。誰ですか？
subtitles.english: Wait, come to think of it, we haven't introduced ourselves? Oh, true. Who are you guys?

subtitles.original: はい！えー、可愛いポジティブジーニアス、奏の女、一条莉々華です！
subtitles.english: Yes! Um, the cute positive genius, Kanade's woman, Ichijou Ririka here!

subtitles.original: 奏の女！ ふぅー！
subtitles.english: Kanade's woman! Woo!

subtitles.original: ブンブンバー！轟はじめ、えー、奏のお姉ちゃん、よろしこー！
subtitles.english: Vroom vroom baa! Todoroki Hajime, um, Kanade's big sister, nice to meetcha!

subtitles.original: お姉ちゃんだわ。お姉さんだわ。どう考えても。
subtitles.english: She's the big sister. She's the big sister. No matter how you look at it.

subtitles.original: はい！はい、えー、ReGLOSSの儒烏風亭らでんでございますー！えー、音乃瀬奏の、コーチ！
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes, um, I'm ReGLOSS's Juufuutei Raden! Uh, Otonose Kanade's coach!

subtitles.original: コーチ！？ 何を教えたの？ 教わった記憶ないんだけど。
subtitles.english: Coach!? What did you teach her? I don't remember being taught anything.

subtitles.original: 見習え、奏を。見習え。こっちがコーチな。それ。
subtitles.english: Learn from Kanade. Learn from her. I'm the coach here. That's it.

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、ReGLOSSのみんな来てくれてありがとー！
subtitles.english: Yes! So, ReGLOSS everyone, thank you for coming!

subtitles.original: この曲歌いたかったんだー！ いい曲。めっちゃいい曲。
subtitles.english: I really wanted to sing this song! It's a good song. A really good song.

subtitles.original: 次はゲストパートなんだけど、一緒にコールお願いしてもいいかな？
subtitles.english: Next is the guest part, but could I ask you guys to do the call with me?

subtitles.original: もちろん！ おー！
subtitles.english: Of course! Oh!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、行くよ。せーの、どうぞー！
subtitles.english: Then, here we go. One, two, go!

subtitles.original: 何も考えなくていいよ 口ずさむばかり愛藍の
subtitles.english: You don't have to think about anything, just humming my beloved indigo

subtitles.original: この音に舞うのよ 忘れないでいたいよ ああ
subtitles.english: Dancing to this sound, I want to keep it in my memory, ah

subtitles.original: 体は無彩色 レイドバック ただうねる音でグルーヴ
subtitles.english: The body is achromatic, laid-back, just grooving with the undulating sound

subtitles.original: ずっと二人で暮らそうよ この夜の隅っこで
subtitles.english: Let's live together forever, in a corner of this night

subtitles.original: 目眩い僕らでいいよ 手を誘ったのは君じゃないの
subtitles.english: Dizzy as we are is fine, it wasn't you who invited me by the hand

subtitles.original: 理屈だけじゃつまらないわ まだ時間が惜しいの おお
subtitles.english: Just logic is boring, time is still precious, oh

subtitles.original: 練り歩く景色はシンコペ 踏み鳴らす足音でグルーヴ
subtitles.english: The walking scenery is syncope, grooving with the sound of stomping footsteps

subtitles.original: まるで僕らはブレーメン たった二人だけの街
subtitles.english: It's as if we are Bremen, a town for just the two of us

subtitles.original: さあ 息を吸って 吐いて 早く吐いて
subtitles.english: Come on, take a breath, exhale, exhale quickly

subtitles.original: 焦って歌っていようぜ 笑う門に舞うもどだい
subtitles.english: Let's keep singing in a hurry, dancing at the gate of laughter is the foundation

subtitles.original: 愛の歌 歌ってんのさ あははは
subtitles.english: We're singing a song of love, ahahaha

subtitles.original: 焦って楽してこうぜ 死ぬほどのことはこの世にないぜ
subtitles.english: Let's hurry and take it easy, there's nothing in this world worth dying for
